resources.string: >> Swipe For Instructions \n << Swipe To Start Editing

OldTwist is a photo editor app with a bunch of old school filters that will take you down the memory lane. 
 To Use this application all you need to know is the following cheat sheet.
 STEP 1: Swipe left from here to select an image from the gallery.
 STEP 2: Tap with two fingers to rotate image.
 STEP 3: Swipe left after rotating to add filters.
 STEP 4: Sweep your hand over the phone to add filters.
 STEP 5: Swipe right to save the edited image to your gallery.
